verses.text:
We would see Jesus: the great rock foundation
Whereon our feet were set with sovereign grace;
Not life, nor death, with all their ag-i-ta-tion,
Can thence re-move us, gaz-ing on his face.
We would see Jesus: other lights are paling,
Which for long years we have re-joiced to see.

metadata.copyright: Music Copyright, 1900, by F. E. Belden
